### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE products (
  product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name STRING,
  stock_quantity INT,
  price DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE orders (
  order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_id INT,
  customer_name STRING,
  order_date DATE,
  delivery_date DATE
)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE products SET stock_quantity = 20 WHERE product_id = 1;
